title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: September 19, 2022, 10:54:12 AMLast edit: October 18, 2022, 03:54:25 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: We came across these on twitter https://twitter.com/noecryptobank/status/1560617977657331712?s=46&t=b7vSGFdbGrgfx0j6NO2JrQThey are a custom privately issued edition and not sold directly from ballet. They appear to be an exchange that accepts fiat and crypto and uses a card issued by mastercard - sounds similar to crypto.com in that way. They do sell these on their site (found in the linked tweet above) in packs 1,3 or 5 and accept USDT only via thst method.I have spoke with them and they agreed to let me do a larger order direct with them.I have a week to place order so please let me know if interested asap.The cost is $40 per walletCan send pymt via the following addresses:BTC: 1GWQHNuVT92nYBS6ALNWUF4mAF9VQaHRBJUSDT (TRC20): TWiivDmm4XGZRTVTHj6iXa3aLXhgmvDzQBPayPal: MoparMiningLLC@gmail.comAny other method - please confirm with me prior to sending pymt.

comments.author: tweetious
comments.created_time: September 19, 2022, 10:59:34 AMLast edit: September 19, 2022, 11:20:34 AM by tweetious
comments.body: Do you know (or can you ask please) which ballet wallet design is included inside the sleeve? Is it a regular ETH logo ballet wallet (with the "Noe Bank" sleeve) OR a special edition "Noe Bank" logo ballet wallet? If the latter, any chance to see a photo of the actual logo/design of the "metal card" wallet?ThanksEdit: Not quite sure if what I wrote above make sense  .... let me rephrase:Is it just a custom-made "Noe Bank" sleeve OR does the included wallet also have a custom-made "Noe Bank" logo too?
